title.narrative: Second Emergency Demobilization and Reintegration Project

description.narrative: The objective of the Project is to support the efforts o f the Recipient to: (i) demobilize members of armed groups o f Rwandan origin and members of the Rwandan Defense Force; and (ii)p rovide socioeconomic reintegration support to said members following demobilization, with a particular focus on the provision of such support to female, child, and disabled ex-combatants.

title.narrative: Ex-combatants who receive reintegration benefits (RG) in time and in accordance with the implementation manual (Comp 3)
Resettlement kits delivered to dependents of ex-AG members (Comp 2)
Ex-combatants who report social acceptance by their communities
Demobilized persons who are satisfied with the services and information provided in the demobilization centers (Comp 1)
Ex-combatants who have received reinsertion benefits (BNK, RSA) (comp 1)
Ex-combatants who settle down in their community of choice (with access to shelter and food security) (Comp 2)
Incoming ex-combatants who are screened for mental health issues (comp 3)
Ex-combatants provided with a national ID number before they leave the demobilization center (comp 4)
Categorized disabled ex-combatants who receive Mutuelles de Santé and monthly allowance as per current legislation, within 9 monthsafter demobilization (comp 4)
Ex-combatants selected to receive VSW support and registered to receive training have successfully completed training/education/IGA(comp 3)
